CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Intercorp Financial Services Inc. Common Shares

Address.label: Address
Address.value: TORRE INTERBANK, AVENUE CARLOS VILLARAN 140,5TH FLOOR, URBANIZACION SANTA CATALINA, LIMA, 13, Peru

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Intercorp Financial Services Inc is a provider of banking, insurance, and wealth management services for retail customers and commercial clients in Peru. Banking segment provides loans, credit facilities, deposits and current accounts. Insurance segment provides life annuity products with single-premium payment and conventional life insurance products, as well as other retail insurance products. Wealth management includes brokerage and investment management services. Inteligo serves mainly Peruvian citizens. Its geographical segments includes Peru and Panama.
